summary: When French King Louis XIV (Beau Bridges) learns that his twin brother, Philippe (Beau Bridges), could usurp his crown, he sets out to imprison him in the Bastille prison but four loyal musketeers are protecting Philippe.
cast: Sylvia Kristel|Ursula Andress|Beau Bridges|Cornel Wilde|Ian McShane|Alan Hale Jr.|Lloyd Bridges|José Ferrer|Olivia de Havilland|Helmut Dantine|Rex Harrison|Román Ariznavarreta|Bernard Bresslaw|Stephan Bastian|Victor Couzyn|Karl Ferth|Fritz von Friedl|Christine Glasner|Fritz Goblirsch|Erhart Hartmann|Billy Horrigan|Michael Janisch|Cissy Kraner|Elisabeth Neumann-Viertel|Heinz Nick|Ingrid Olofson|Stephan Paryla|Albert Rueprecht|Ute Rumm|Tony Smart|Robert Werner|Heinz Winter|Stanley E. Foster|Patrick Pinney
title: El quinto mosquetero
